channel.title: [317 Delta][Non-Refractored] How do I customize Loading bar?
channel.description: How do I customize the loading bar of the client? (The one that says, Unpacking interfaces etc) I want to make it look blue and make it smaller (Lower height), any ideas?

item.title: [317 Delta][Non-Refractored] How do I customize Loading bar?
item.dc:creator: @aekramer aekramer
item.description:
@aekramer wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=i str pk i link=topic=484952.msg3554639#msg3554639 date=1301789803]
try GUI
[/quote]Don’t post unless you know what you’re talking about.

@OP; you need to modify the loading bar methods in the client class.[/quote]
K thanks, do you have any idea what method it could be? Reading out a file is not that a big prob, but Client.java is rlly big and I have actually no clue what I am looking for :S

Read full topic
item.source: [317 Delta][Non-Refractored] How do I customize Loading bar?
